Class AlgControlThread 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Thread
           |
           +----XQTThread
                   |
                   +----AlgControlThread
public class AlgControlThread
extends XQTThread
AlgControlThread.java controls retrieving frames of animation. implements methods in XQTThread which signal stop, forward, reverse, step forward, step reverse, and the delay between frames of animation.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

FORWARD
REVERSE
sim
STEP_FORWARD
STEP_REVERSE

set the execution mode of the thread: stop,forward,rev,step, and the length of delay.
